actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Subcommittee on Aviation Discharged.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 111-611.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 238.
Mr. Schauer moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5591.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.

actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Cleared for White House.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 111-326.

official_title: To designate the airport traffic control tower located at Spokane International Airport in Spokane, Washington, as the "Ray Daves Airport Traffic Control Tower".

summary.text: Designates the airport traffic control tower located at Spokane International Airport in Spokane, Washington, and any successor airport traffic control tower at that location, as the Ray Daves Airport Traffic Control Tower.

titles.title: To designate the facility of the Federal Aviation Administration located at Spokane International Airport in Spokane, Washington, as the "Ray Daves Air Traffic Control Tower".
To designate the airport traffic control tower located at Spokane International Airport in Spokane, Washington, as the "Ray Daves Airport Traffic Control Tower".
